1110101011101101 0110010001100010 0 -> sum: 0100111101001111, cout: 1
1111000011110000 0011110010101111 1 -> sum: 0010110110100000, cout: 1
1011010011001111 0110100011000011 1 -> sum: 0001110110010011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
